title: Appointments to the Independent Police Conduct Authority (Ministry for the Environment of New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Ministry for the Environment of New Zealand ) Justice Minister Amy Adams has welcomed the appointment of former public sector chief executive Simon Murdoch and the reappointment of Dianne Macaskill to the Independent Police Conduct
